name: Xanthius
overview: Xanthius is 2D platform game. Far future, action takes place on planetoid Xanthius - selected to human colonisation. Construction robots built a several Atmosphere Processing Stations (APs), but one from them is malfunctioning. The player controls the "Protopod Maintenance droid" (this droid looks like ball on legs), and must repair broken station. Droid can jump and has limited energy. - but the planet's wildlife can drain or add to him energy levels.
